answers.answer: I'm a big girl girl b4 baby. I'm 34 weeks now n I'm measuring 38weeks.. So far I have measured 4-5 weeks bigger. Just left the doc.  All the doc says is he is a big baby. But I've only gained 8lbs.

If you continue to measure off they will just do a growth scan to make sure its the baby and not excess fluid. Nothing to worry about. I measured 4-5 weeks ahead at 31 weeks and I worried for nothing. U/S showed everything was normal

Ok thanks I'm just worried I could have diabetes... I don't know if it's a genic thing but my man was 10 and half pounds at birth  so I'm not sure if my little girl will be big or not.... that is one heck of a baby to push out

question: So I just got back from my doctors appointment and she measured  my belly and said I was measuring 3-5 weeks ahead right now I'm 23w 1d what could this mean.   I'm on the heavy side so could this mean I have gestinal diabetes or I'm having a big baby or just the extra weight I had on me.... anyone have this happen
title: concerned
